name: Roasted Romanesco Tarragon and Olives
description: This roasted romanesco with tarragon, olive and lemon is a healthy side dish to any meal.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl combine romanesco, olive oil, salt, and pepper and toss to coat.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl combine romanesco, olive oil, salt, and pepper and toss to coat.

recipeInstructions.text: Place romanesco on a sheet pan lined with parchment paper and cover with foil. Roast for 30 min.
recipeInstructions.name: Place romanesco on a sheet pan lined with parchment paper and cover with foil. Roast for 30 min.

recipeInstructions.text: Uncover and raise oven temperature to 400F. Roast for 15 more minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Uncover and raise oven temperature to 400F. Roast for 15 more minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Remove romanesco from oven and combine with fresh tarragon, lemon juice, lemon zest, and olives. Adjust seasoning and serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Remove romanesco from oven and combine with fresh tarragon, lemon juice, lemon zest, and olives. Adjust seasoning and serve.
